display.title: Life Drinker Jewel
display.description: Combine a Runecarver's Jewel in an Experience Infuser with a stack of Golden Apples, Golden Carrots & Glistening Melon Slices [Required: 1x Any Runecarver's Jewel 64x Golden Apple 64x Golden Carrot 64x Glistening Melon Slice | Drop Craft With: Experience Infuser]
